attributes.action: strongly encourage companies to reduce their packaging and paper marketing material
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Introduce some mechanism, such as regulation or taxation, to reduce the amount of packaging and paper-based marketing materials. Whilst individuals are constantly being reminded of their environmental duties, companies continue to use large amounts of packaging with their products. Schemes such as self-rinse and refilling of glass bottles for should be encouraged. 
In addition, for example, bank statements come with 5/6 sheets of marketing material, which aren't relevant to the statement. At a rough estimate probably ~80% of post ultimately ends up in the waste bin. In some cases, where address are printed, this has privacy issues.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
